column3: Faculty of Social Science & Public Policy
column5: The Economics & Policy MSc offers strong disciplinary and methods training on Economics with an eye to applying key methodological tools in the analysis of economic policy making. It aspires to train professional economists who will embark on careers in both private and government sectors as well as international organisations that are responsible for designing and implementing economic policy.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
